about.me: Dave Patterson owner of Digital Ark a Self Made Entrepreneur, Telecommunication Field Engineer, Car Enthusiast.
about.server: Digital Ark Pool is a mix of bare-metal and cloud servers to provide low latency and 24/7 uptime.
about.mission: Our mission is to mobilize everyone to utilize their capital (time, money, knowledge, influence) to expand the development of society, through a unique experience of co-contribution that facilitates adoption of the Cardano protocol, reveals new possibilities, and ignites the public imagination worldwide. We envision a world where as many people as possible are empowered to invest their time or money into an ecosystem that solves problems using the Cardano protocol.
